Inspirational Assault.name: Inspirational Assault
Inspirational Assault.fullText:
White Raven Attack 11Inspirational Assault

You land a mighty blow, inspiring an ally to follow suit.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one ally within 5 squares of you gains a power bonus to his or her next attack roll before the end of your next turn equal to the number of allies within 2 squares of you.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 102.
Inspirational Assault.flavor: You land a mighty blow, inspiring an ally to follow suit.
Inspirational Assault.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one ally within 5 squares of you gains a power bonus to his or her next attack roll before the end of your next turn equal to the number of allies within 2 squares of you.

White Raven's Gambit.name: White Raven's Gambit
White Raven's Gambit.fullText:
White Raven Attack 20White Raven's Gambit

Your powerful attack clips your enemy, weakening its defenses and allowing an ally to follow up with a strong attack.

Daily        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. As a free action, one ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against the target with a power bonus to the damage roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Miss: Half damage, and one ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 102.
White Raven's Gambit.flavor: Your powerful attack clips your enemy, weakening its defenses and allowing an ally to follow up with a strong attack.
White Raven's Gambit.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. As a free action, one ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against the target with a power bonus to the damage roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.
White Raven's Gambit.onMiss: Half damage, and one ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.

Order from Chaos.name: Order from Chaos
Order from Chaos.fullText:
White Raven Utility 12Order from Chaos

You yell out a series of quick orders, directing your allies to superior positions among your enemies.

Daily        Martial
Move Action      Close burst 10

Target: You and each ally in the burst

Effect: Each target can shift his or her speed as a free action, ignoring difficult terrain. Each target gains combat advantage against every enemy until the end of your next turn.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 102.
Order from Chaos.flavor: You yell out a series of quick orders, directing your allies to superior positions among your enemies.
Order from Chaos.target: You and each ally in the burst
Order from Chaos.effect: Each target can shift his or her speed as a free action, ignoring difficult terrain. Each target gains combat advantage against every enemy until the end of your next turn.
